product_summary: Semiform is a platform that allows users to replace forms with AI agents. This enables respondents to type their answers in natural language, leading to higher response rates and happier users. Semiform uses AI to parse users' natural language responses into structured data, and it can even ask follow-up questions if necessary.
product_pros: Uses AI to parse natural language responses
product_cons: May not be suitable for all types of forms
May require some training to use effectively
May not be able to handle complex forms
May not be able to integrate with all systems

product_usecases.details: Semiform can be used to collect feedback from customers, employees, or other stakeholders. This feedback can be used to improve products or services, or to make decisions about future directions.
Semiform can be used to conduct surveys on a variety of topics. This information can be used to gain insights into customer needs, preferences, and behaviors.
Semiform can be used to qualify leads by asking a series of questions to determine if they are a good fit for your product or service.
Semiform can be used to generate leads by capturing information from potential customers. This information can then be used to nurture leads and convert them into paying customers.
Semiform can be used to provide customer support by answering questions and resolving issues. This can help to improve customer satisfaction and loyalty.

product_toolfor.details: Semiform is a valuable tool for businesses of all sizes. It can help businesses to collect feedback, conduct surveys, qualify leads, generate leads, and provide customer support.
Semiform is a powerful tool for researchers. It can help researchers to collect data, conduct surveys, and analyze results.
Semiform can be used by educators to create interactive quizzes, surveys, and other educational materials.
Semiform can be used by non-profit organizations to collect donations, conduct surveys, and recruit volunteers.
Semiform can be used by individuals to collect feedback, conduct surveys, and learn new things.

product_pricing: Semiform is currently in a free beta. All features are available at no charge for beta users—no credit card required.
